name: Deli Trip
description:
Deli Trip is an interactive fiction game about your friend taking you for lunch. Get to know all the employees in this small family grocery store, think about life, and eat a really good sandwich. I made this game based off a true family grocery store that is very important to me. It is owned by some very close friends, and was also my first job. I hope players can feel a little bit of what makes this place special.

Music credits:

-Free Nationals, Gidget

- Sounds for the Supermarket 5 (1975)

-Nana Theme, Holland Patent Public Library
